content.startStoring: Start storing your passwords in a YubiKey-encrypted KeePassage database
content.tapToComplete:
Tap your YubiKey sensor
to complete the operation
content.dbMinimiseLock: Lock database after minimising the window
content.areYouSureReset: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default?
content.enterPinFor: Enter PIN for YubiKey with serial number
content.title: Title
content.fillInDisplayName: Please fill in the display name and an optional description for your new database:
content.pleasePlugInKey:
Please plug in the YubiKey keys you would like to pair with this database and tick the "Paired" checkbox.
It is recommended to add at least two keys, so that one can serve as a backup.
content.beforeUsingGenerateKey:
Before using a YubiKey with this program, you need to generate an ECDSA P-256 key in the PIV applet.
You can follow this guide:
content.youHaveOnlySelected1: You have only selected 1 key. It is highly recommended to pair at least 2 keys so that one can serve as a backup.
content.pleaseConnectCorrectKey: Please connect the correct YubiKey with one of the following serial numbers
content.pleaseSelectEntryToEdit: Please select an entry you would like to edit
content.pleaseSelectEntryToDelete: Please select an entry you would like to delete
content.cannotDeleteEntryDoesNotExist: Cannot delete this entry as it does not exist
content.areYouSureDeleteEntry: Are you sure you want to delete entry
